node.title: Tasmania could get an offshore wind farm with capacity to power hundreds of thousands of households
node.description: A multi-billion-dollar wind farm that could take up an area as big as Cape Barren Island has been proposed off Tasmania's north-east.
node.content:
["A multi-billion-dollar wind farm that could take up an area as big as Cape Barren Island has been proposed off Tasmania's north-east.", "But according to one expert, without Marinus Link\u00a0\u2014 the yet-to-be built undersea power cable and electricity storage project \u2014\u00a0it may never go ahead.", "The wind farm will generate between 500 and 1,000 megawatts of renewable energy, enough to power over 325,000 homes.", "Proponent\u00a0Nexsphere hopes to have the Bass Offshore Wind Energy Project operating by 2026.", "Stage one will include about 35 turbines that will have a life span of 40 years.", "Company's chief executive Glen Kierse said Nexsphere\u00a0wanted\u00a0to make use of the wind conditions in Bass Strait.", "Mr Kierse said the turbines would\u00a0appear \"over the horizon\" in Bass Strait minimising their visual impact and won't be seen from land.", "\"We haven't decided the exact location yet but we're looking at developing a project around 500 to 1,000 megawatts in an area between George Town and Flinders Island,\" he said.", "\"It will have the capacity to be able to support Tasmanian industry through connections into places like George Town, into Bell Bay, into hydrogen and eventually if Marinus goes ahead to be able to connect into northern Victoria.\"\u00a0", "", "
The proponent\u00a0wants\u00a0to make use of the wind conditions in Bass Strait.(bassoffshorewindenergy.com.au)
", "The wind turbines will be fixed structures, positioned in depths of between 40 to 60 metres.", "There'll be plenty of space in between the turbines but they'll take up an area roughly the size of Cape Barren Island if further stages of the wind farm are progressed.", "The scale of the project is something that has never been seen in the state before.", "The Granville Harbour wind farm generates about 100 megawatts while Cattle Hill generates about 140 megawatts.", "The offshore proposal in Bass Strain could generate ten-times that amount.", "
'Quite speculative in nature'
", "Offshore wind farms are gaining traction globally but are relatively new to Australia.", "They've been developed successfully off the Continental Shelf in Western Europe, the United Kingdom and the United States.", "\"One of the key parts of what we're looking to do is to develop this project in a way that reflects some of those values.\"", "Doubts have been already been raised about whether the project will go head.", "In November, a report found a proposed undersea power cable and electricity storage project in Tasmania would be too expensive to compete with battery storage in Victoria.\u00a0", "The Victoria Energy Policy Centre updated a report it published last year on the economic prospects of the Marinus Link and Battery of the Nation projects.", "Both\u00a0reports were commissioned by the Bob Brown Foundation.", "The report's author Bruce Mountain said the projects would end up costing more than they can earn.\u00a0", "Tasmanian energy consultant Marc White has raised doubts about whether the ambitious project will go ahead.", "\"These projects are certainly reliant on the Marinus interconnector,\" he said.", "\"A lot of the offshore wind projects are quite speculative in nature and that's because they're really reliant on the national market.", "The interconnector is set to play a key role in whether the project stacks up financially.", "\"The Marinus interconnector is really the linchpin\u00a0for that size project.\" Mr White said.", "There's a number of wind farm proposals in the state.\u00a0Some have attracted more opposition that others.", "", "
Birdlife Tasmania says\u00a0the \"last thing we want to do is add another threat or another risk\" to\u00a0threatened species of birds in the area.(Supplied:\u00a0Helen Cunningham)
", "Eric Woehler from Birdlife Tasmania said he had\u00a0some concerns about the proposed wind farm.\u00a0", "\"We need the wind farms, we need renewable energy, but we need to make sure that we're not creating more harm,\" he said.", "\"We know that there are many threatened species that migrate between Tasmania and the mainland, the last thing we want to do is add another threat or another risk to an already threatened species,\" he said.\u00a0", "Mr Woehler said it was difficult to survey offshore wind farms.\u00a0", "\"There are offshore wind farms around the world, particularly in Europe at the moment, and we can learn the lessons of how they've dealt with seabird being killed by the wind farms.", "The company plans to seek community input during the design, licensing and construction of the project."]
